task_title: Phase 8: US6 Test Data Isolation and Cleanup (T080-T090)
task_requirements:
Implement the Data Harness module for ARTK Core v1 - test data isolation and cleanup.

**Tasks (11 total):**
- T080: Create data types in core/typescript/data/types.ts
- T081: Implement generateRunId function in core/typescript/data/namespace.ts
- T082: Implement namespace() and parseNamespace() functions in core/typescript/data/namespace.ts
- T083: Implement CleanupManager class in core/typescript/data/cleanup.ts
- T084: Implement abstract DataBuilder base class in core/typescript/data/builders.ts
- T085: Implement DataApiClient for data operations in core/typescript/data/api-client.ts
- T086: Implement createFactory and createSequencedFactory utilities in core/typescript/data/factories.ts
- T087: Create data module barrel export in core/typescript/data/index.ts
- T088-T090: Write unit tests for namespace, CleanupManager, DataBuilder

**Context Files:**
- specs/001-artk-core-v1/data-model.md sections 2.3-2.5 (TestDataManager, CleanupManager, DataBuilder)
- specs/001-artk-core-v1/spec.md FR-025 to FR-028

**Key Requirements:**
- FR-025: Generate unique run IDs for test isolation
- FR-026: Namespacing utilities that append run ID to values
- FR-027: Execute registered cleanup functions after test completion
- FR-028: Run cleanup even when tests fail (configurable)

**After each task:** Update specs/001-artk-core-v1/tasks.md
